title: Lawyer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Coverup, framing them as a Lawyer tonight. If they die tonight, they are cleaned, and cannot be targeted by anyone other than the Elites.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You have 3 uses of Coverup.
- You see past all cleans, regardless if you performed them or not.
- You can hear all players' whispers.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all opposition to the Elites.

desc:
Post 4895
*It appears there is a lack of sufficient evidence to support your claims.*
